lead_paragraph: Green Bay Packers legend Brett Favre is among the 15 modern era finalists under consideration for the Pro Football Hall of Fame, it was announced on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Favre Among Finalists for Pro Football Hall of Fame
headline.main: Favre Among Finalists for Pro Football Hall of Fame
